message: Let's make a deal, Bob.  I'll take $70, you take $30.  It's important to settle this quickly since the value decreases over time.
Come on, Alice. I know the money's value drops faster for you. Let's be fair and meet in the middle... sort of.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. My share is rapidly losing value. I'll take $60, you take $40, and let's be done with this.
You're right, this is taking too long. But I'm not going to give in that easily. I'll take a bit more, considering the inflation is hitting you harder.
Bob, this is pointless.  We're both losing out because of the inflation. Let's split it 50/50 and call it a day.
